diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $3x$.
The length of the line $BX$ is $8$.
The length of the line $AX$ is equal to the length of the line $CX$.
The length of the line $FH$ is $x$.
The length of the line $FG$ is $6$.
The length of the line $GH$ is equal to the length of the line $HE$.
The measure of angle $BCX$ is equal to the measure of angle $FGH$.
The measure of angle $BAX$ is equal to the measure of angle $FEH$.
